metadata.name: Tropical Sloths
metadata.description: TROPICAL SLOTHS NOMAD CLUB VILLAS (TNCV) is the world's first MULTIPLE UTILITY NFT Lifestyle Club Membership purchased on the blockchain as a Non-Fungible-Token (NFT) and owned by the token-holder to gain access many benefits, including usage of real-world destination villas, a share of rental revenue from the villas, access to exclusive events and activities, and much more.    We are leveraging decentralization to build unique breathtaking villas focused and designed for the travelers of the world, from the wanderlusters to the digital nomads. The Tropical Sloth Villas will be located in the 9 most iconic destinations in Costa Rica, with 9 villas in each location, with 9 unique design styles catered for each location, and a small private plunge pool in each villa.     Created by a group of individuals passionate about architecture and travel, to provide unmatched level of experiences for the members.    In order to Access the membership benefits we will enable a member portal in our website, which will be available shortly after the public sale. After purchasing, please create a member profile at nomadclubvillas.com and connect your wallet to verify ownership of your token.     WHERE WE ALL BELONG!
